RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 78. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SAME DI STANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMAAZA rushed to contend on turn, won driving. RIVERSIDE WALK (GB) surged late, just missed. KANFU dueled, held show. ADULTING late bid. SMOOTH RITHMS steadied entering turn. MOMMY BERTA steadied in turn. SHOW ME THE BEST steadied turn. MY LOVELY GIRL outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: My Lovely Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contend on turn, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 71. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 11 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)( W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONSTITUTIONALRAGE launched bid on turn, took command entering stretch, won driving. PINK CHANNEL settled behind leaders, second best. HIGH DOLLAR DATE rallied late. AMERICA'S DREAM steadied soon after start, bid, tired. DIXIE'S DANCE dueled, gave way. MISS SHADY up close, tired. BAY OF ANGELS no factor. LITTLE FOUR tired. MOONLIGHT TANGO brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: America's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied soon after start, bid, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutionalrage
ENTRY.COMMENT: launched bid on turn,took command, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 7 1/2F Turf CR: 73. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run ONE MILE Main Track .).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAGUA rallied, won driving. LILLY CHROME settled behind leaders, rallied, second best. FRANCIA (PER) set pace, weakened. GRAND VENUS no threat. YESTERDAYSPLAN showed little. HIGH HEAVEN tired. BOUJEE KITTEN outrun. SECRET AFFIRMATION outrun, eased late.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: JayArDee Stables & Haras Dona Icha deOcala LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Lilly Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled behind leaders, rallied, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPENDING CUTS chased, moved to challenge on turn, drew off driving. MACI'S WORLD rallied. MOON RIDGE set pace, weakened. BIG RED WAVE needed more. QUEEN CATALINA bothered start, saved ground. THE ENEMY OF FUN no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Spending Cuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,moved to challenge on turn, drew off, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 11, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONYA'S MAGIC dueled, led, won driving. CAPTAIN ANNE bid, repelled, second best. BISCOTTINI four wide. LUCKY ROAD dueled, tired. BEE WINGS outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Donya's Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Staley Terry and Lugovich Charles F

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 11, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHNNY U saved ground, rallied, up late driving. COLONEL MIKE chased pace three wide, late surge, second best. QUAD EIGHTS set pace, weakened late. SEMINOLE JUSTICE no factor. BOLD PROPHET steadied early, showed little.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 11 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less N ot Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PEACE OF EKATI reserved early, commenced rally on turn, driving. SMASH second best. HELLUVA LIFE far back early, good late run for show. HARD ASTRAY opened big lead early, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back early, good late run for show

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, commenced rally on turn, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS NUCKOLS set pace, increased lead, held driving. TIME FOR CUPID wide trip, rallied. RAHTID saved ground, rallied. GOLD PASS even effort. DETAILED chased pace, weakened. W H LITTLE MISS GO no threat. NYSSA outrun. OFFTHEROADAGAIN outrun.
